schoolName: Martin Luther King Jr. Tech Academy
description:
Martin Luther King Jr. Tech Academy (MLKTA) is a learning community that strives to be student-driven, academically rigorous, and high achieving where all students and staff are valued and held to high expectations in their overall growth and success while also building and nurturing positive relationships between students, teachers, staff, families, and our community partners. MLKTA has approximately 450 students with free transportation offered for students outside of a 2.5 mile radius. 

Students, teachers, staff and parents have access to top-notch technology that allows for quality instruction that nurtures student learning and supports parent/guardians. MLKTA is not just a school, we are a family who takes pride in our school and surrounding community for the sake of OUR children's advancement: academically, socially and emotionally.
